t: Use Shop with Points - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon's Shop with Points program offers you the ability to use rewards points from participating credit card and loyalty programs for purchases at Amazon.com. You can use your reward points towards millions of items at Amazon.com checkout, including Kindle eBooks, Prime Video Purchases & Rentals, ...
Amazon Points can be used to pay for purchases made on the Amazon.co.jp website. Each Amazon Point is worth ¥1 when used to buy any item.

Prime membership is a paid subscription that gives members access to shipping, shopping, streaming, reading, and other benefits. Redeem your points to pay for your Prime membership today. Learn more · Points can be redeemed to select from a massive selection of books, newspapers, and comics.
